snippet: Senator Michael N. Gianaris, whose district has been challenged under a Republican redistricting plan, is focusing on bringing Democrats back to power in the State Senate.
abstract: New York State Senator Michael N Gianaris, Democrat whose district in Astoria, Queens, has been challenged under a Republican redistricting plan, is focusing on bringing Democrats back to power in the State Senate.
lead_paragraph: Senator Michael N. Gianaris, whose district has been challenged under a Republican redistricting plan, is focusing on bringing Democrats back to power in the State Senate.

headline.seo: Gianaris Focuses on Campaigns of Democrats
headline.main: Democratic State Senator, His District Threatened, Focuses on Party’s Future
headline.print_headline: Democratic State Senator, His District Threatened, Focuses on Party’s Future
